thread.title: Former Chinese Oil Executive Jiang Jiemin Sentenced to 16 Years in Prison
thread.title_full: Former Chinese Oil Executive Jiang Jiemin Sentenced to 16 Years in Prison - WSJ

author: Carlos Tejada
title: Former Chinese Oil Executive Jiang Jiemin Sentenced to 16 Years in Prison
text:
BEIJING—The former chief of China’s biggest oil company and a onetime top official overseeing its biggest state-owned enterprises was sentenced to 16 years in prison for bribery, state media said on Monday.
On its verified Weibo social media account on Monday, official broadcaster China Central Television said Jiang Jiemin wouldn’t appeal his sentence. Mr. Jiang has been unreachable for comment.
CCTV said the court found that... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
